text.content: Since you defeated our brother, Corrin. Elise and I think you deserve a reward, ~name~.
Yeah. Camilla and I want you to try out our new maid. Speaking of which...
Alright, maid. Show ~name~ what you're hiding under your skirt.
Prepare to serve your new master, "sister."
